dc_title_s: Oil and Gas Basins, North America, Winter 2016
dc_description_s: This polygon shapefile represents oil and gas basins in the United States, Canada, and Mexico. This layer is from Winter Quarter 2016.This layer is intended to assist users in locating and analyzing oil and gas basin data in North America and may be used for basic applications such as viewing, querying, and map output production, or to provide a basemap to support graphical overlays and analysis with other spatial data.
